542320.name: Fantasy Grounds - ArcKnight Tokens - Mankind
542320.description:
Arcknight Tokens - Mankind

Humans, Halflings, Knights, Mercenaries, Mages, Children, Civilians, and much more!
Mankind is a 62 piece core set of human and city-themed art. Each piece comes with Hero Portraits for all pieces as well.
This set includes:
  • Adventurer
  • Alchemist
  • Bard
  • Dead body(Male/female)
  • Carriage
  • Carriage Noble
  • Cart
  • Cavalry(3 types)
  • Child (7 types)
  • Civilian (6 types)
  • Cleric
  • Fighter (3 types)
  • Guard (5 types)
  • Halfling (5 types)
  • Knight (6 types)
  • Mage (3 types)
  • Mercenary (4 types)
  • Noble (4 types)
  • Paladin
  • Pony
  • Priest
  • Priestess (2 types)
  • Valkyrie
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Doug Davison
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
